name: my3D PRESENTS...HD
description:
MY3D APPS CAN ONLY BE VIEWED WITH THE MY3D VIEWER. VISIT MY3DNOW.COM TO PURCHASE.

MY3D PRESENTS…HD IS COMPATIBLE WITH iPhone 4G AND iPod touch 4 ONLY

my3D Presents…HD will introduce you to the exciting world of my3D, showcasing 3D movie trailers, cool video demos of additional my3D apps, slide shows and more. my3D Presents…HD is updated regularly on your device as new content is available for you to sample.
